New Records: Virat Kohli equaled Kumar Sangakkara with his 118th fifty-plus score in ODIs, matching an elite list that includes Sachin Tendulkar
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a fluent fifty against Sri Lanka in India's World Cup 2023 match
Kohli and Shubman Gill stitched a 100-plus partnership
Pre-Game Insights: Virat Kohli was in sensational form in the tournament, hitting 4 fifties and a hundred so far
Kohli had a rare failure against England but bounced back against Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli looked relaxed ahead of the big game in Mumbai, shaking a leg with his former teammate Harbhajan Singh who was at the venue for commentary duty
Miscellaneous Highlights: Virat Kohli was second only to Sachin Tendulkar in terms of fifty-plus scores in ODI World Cups
